main_definition: Outdoor refers to anything related to the outside or open-air environment, often used in contexts where activities take place outside of buildings or enclosed spaces.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Areas accessible and enjoyed by humans
meanings_and_examples.example: The city park is a popular outdoor area for families to have picnics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Activities or events occurring outside of indoor spaces
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to host the wedding ceremony in an open-air garden, making it an outdoor event.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Describing something designed for use in natural settings
meanings_and_examples.example: The company specializes in manufacturing high-quality outdoor furniture suitable for gardens and patios.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concerning the external environment or nature
meanings_and_examples.example: Many artists find inspiration from painting landscapes, focusing on their love of the outdoor scenery.
